abstract: Google tries to get advertisers excited about buying ads on YouTube, explaining that it’s not all about homemade videos.
snippet: Google tries to get advertisers excited about buying ads on YouTube, explaining that it’s not all about homemade videos.
lead_paragraph: It used to be only television networks that could get senior advertising executives to drop their plans for an afternoon or evening to party, but now gatherings hosted by the likes of Google and Facebook are the place to be seen.
